name: Jump Rope: Mixed Session
description: A balanced jump rope workout with warmup, skills practice, footwork drills, and cardio finisher. Shuffle to randomize which workout you get - each one focuses on different areas.
tips: Hit shuffle to get a random workout variation
Each variation focuses on different aspects: skills, cardio, footwork, or progressions
Keep your rope sized correctly - handles should reach your armpits when standing on the middle
